entity.name: GlobalBudget

decimal.name: totalAmountExpected
decimal.title: Expected amount
decimal.help: Expected amount allocated on the budget. This amount is automatically computed by adding up expected amounts of bellowed levels.

decimal.name: totalAmountCommitted
decimal.title: Committed amount
decimal.help: Represents the sum of orders of status requested, validated or finished and that don't have a invoiced invoice.

decimal.name: totalAmountAvailable
decimal.title: Available amount
decimal.help: Represents the expected amount minus the sum of realized amounts.

decimal.name: realizedWithNoPo
decimal.title: Realized with no po
decimal.help: Represents the sum of ventilated invoices with no order and daybook and accounted moves with no invoice.

decimal.name: realizedWithPo
decimal.title: Realized with po
decimal.help: Represents the sum of ventilated invoices with an order.

decimal.name: totalFirmGap
decimal.title: Firm gap
decimal.help: Represents the sum of amounts realized with or without commitment that exceed the initial

decimal.name: simulatedAmount
decimal.title: Simulated amount
decimal.help: Represents the sum of moves of status simulated.

decimal.name: availableAmountWithSimulated
decimal.title: Available amount with simulated moves
decimal.help: Represents the expected amount minus the sum of realized amounts and the sum of moves of status simulated.
